content.rendered:
Livia graduated from University of Wales with a MBA Master business Administration (International Business) and completed Bachelor of Economics and Tourism in Hungary. Livia joined Regent Group in August 2019 as an Admission Officer. She has been working at education sector the last 4 years which she really enjoys.

Livia is proud to be part of such a wonderful and welcoming community and will be working with such a fantastic group of students.

Key responsibilities:

  • Liaise with applicants and following student`s application journey
  • Communicate with university partnership regarding student admission status and progress
  • Provide professional advice, guidance on admission and recruitment processes and procedures to potential students
